title: Microsoft is killing WordPad in Windows after 28 years
description: Microsoft announced today that it will deprecate WordPad with a future Windows update as it's no longer under active development, though the company did not specify the precise timing of this change. [...]

title: Exploit released for critical VMware SSH auth bypass vulnerability
description: Proof-of-concept exploit code has been released for a critical SSH authentication bypass vulnerability in VMware's Aria Operations for Networks analysis tool (formerly known as vRealize Network Insight). [...]

title: Microsoft reminds of Windows 11 21H2 forced updates before end of service
description: Microsoft has reminded customers that systems running Windows 11 21H2 will be force-updated before reaching the end of servicing next month. [...]

title: Microsoft retires Visual Studio for Mac, support ends in a year
description: Microsoft has announced it is retiring Visual Studio for Mac and that support for the latest version, 17.6, will continue for another year, until August 31, 2024. [...]

title: Golf gear giant Callaway data breach exposes info of 1.1 million
description: Topgolf Callaway (Callaway) suffered a data breach at the start of August, which exposed the sensitive personal and account data of more than a million customers. [...]
